pullRequest.title: Improve robustness of our devtools Gradle code
pullRequest.bodyText:
Attempt to improve dependencies handling for Gradle. This leverages QuarkusModel from Gradle plugin to extract list of dependencies for project.
Fixes: #11303

nodes.bodyText:
Can't you remove this from addDependencyInModel now that we check before?:
if (buildContent.indexOf(newDependency) == -1) {
If you are collecting platforms here, deploymentDeps isn't just the platforms (BOMs), it includes the extension deployment artifacts as well.

nodes.bodyText: @mgorniew why are we using org.apache.maven.model.Dependency here?
